title: The Zombies That Walk Among Us
description: The idea of human zombies probably seems pretty far-fetched. But there are real zombies out there in the animal kingdom. Ed Yong of The Atlantic creeps us out with a couple of examples. Hint: they involve fungus. Follow Maddie on Twitter - she's @maddie_sofia. Email the show at shortwave@npr.org.

itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: Ed Yong, science reporter for The Atlantic, creeps us out with real zombies of the animal kingdom.
